requirements.Description: The system have to measure the distance from the sensor location to the water surface
The maximum tolerable error for distance measuring is 1cm
The system needs to ensure reliable readings
The measured values have to be between the 10 cm and 100 cm
In case of faulty measurement, the water pump must be deactivated and the controller swtiched to fault state
The system needs to monitor the water level every 500ms
The system must use the malfuntion lamp to indicate the operator that the fault state is triggered
The system must remain in fault state until the operator acknowledge the error
The system must provide a reset buton in order to exit the fault state
The system have to report the cause of the fault system on the LCD
In case of the undefined behaviour, the system have to display the following message: 'Error: Call service' and enter the fault state
The height of the water level must be configurable by using the rotary encoder
The mode can be switch between AUTO and MANUAL by using the switch
A reset button must be provided to enable the operator to exit fault mode
The system must monitor that the water pump is active just when it is commanded to
The system must deactivate the water pump in case it is active when it should not be
Water pump must be activated when LOWER_THRESHOLD is hit until the UPPER_THRESHOLD is met
